sub_title: Senior Business Executive leisure, sport, entertainment, tourism, events and real estate across the life-cycle
summary:
A passion for developing and making big ideas & concepts a reality, manage the process, solve complex business challenges using both traditional methods & modern technology. Got the talent to see the issues, opportunities, or risks from many perspectives, Drive & lead from the front and do not give up when others might. 

Held senior corporate roles & have been advising leadership/ executive management in many countries serving both public & private organizations in several industries: real estate development & investment, facility management, hotels & hospitality, sport, tourism development, attractions, event management, sovereign wealth, management consultancy, corporate finance, research, government development, start-up, ticketing & e-commerce. Personal/professional experience has shown & taught me the following:

Been often the architect and driver behind many new ideas, concepts, projects, businesses (up to $1bn+)
• Excel in moving forward big ideas/ concepts into execution/ reality within given constraints
• Understand numbers & detail, but also trust the gut instinct & always value the opinion of others
• Believe in the customer & team to drive success

Able to bring together, align, lead & grow world-class teams (2-100+ people)
• Like to win, but also know when to move on - see as an experience/ education - coach
• Always learn, accept new ideas, seek input, discover & be adaptable 
• Can speak at all levels in organizations
• Understand nuisances & sensitivities of cultures and speak 4 languages 
• Tell stories, narrative that motivate 
• Understand responsibility vs accountability 

Educate, refine, and drive myself to be a better person  
• Stay calm when faced with adversity
• Focus on making high quality decisions, if not it will cost you
• Enjoy working in international environment
• Meeting new people, hearing new perspectives & ideas 

Skills: vision leadership, business strategy, international business development, proposals & presentations, business plan writing, feasibility, master plan, budgeting, technical writing, market research & data analysis, financial modelling, sales management, project management, due diligence, KPI management & reporting, risk management, start-up and joint ventures, asset management, strategic marketing, customer relationship management (CRM), time management, program management, portfolio management, contract negotiations, P&L & performance improvement, corporate governance & board, organizational design & transformation, change management, account management, JV, team building, customer experience CX

authors.headline: Senior Business Executive leisure, sport, entertainment, tourism, events and real estate across the life-cycle
A seasoned German C-level executive with very deep strategy background in real estate development, hospitality and tourism. Open for freelance assignments.

profile_positions.description: GRS Hypercube is a research, data analytics company providing the full range of services focused on customer experience (CX) in the leisure, tourism, hospitality and services industry. We find the ultimate customer - Angel Customers - for company’s, destinations and brands. Our Angel Customer Program (ACP) is the next level beyond customer satisfaction (CSAT), Net Promoter Score (NPS).
profile_positions.title: Senior Adviser & Co-Founder (GRS Hypercube)

profile_positions.description:
Member of Executive Leadership team at FLASH Entertainment, a live events and entertainment company, overseeing corporate planning & strategy, business development, investment strategies, joint venture development, sponsorship & sales and asset management of du Forum (35,000 capacity) and du Forum (4,000 capacity). Also involved in project management, performance improvement projects, event and creative concept development, content development and financial modeling. Examples of work:
- Generated successful proposals and developed new event concepts for FLASH including 2019 AFC Asian Cup, FIFA Club World Cup 2017 & 2018, Abu Dhabi Science Festival, Jiu Jitsu World Championship, Freej theatre shows, Abu Dhabi Summer Season Programmes, Mother Of Nation 2017 & 2018, Innovator, World Cup Fan Zone, ....
- Contributor to strong revenue growth and improved profit margins since working with FLASH.
- Led and successfully launched first international live entertainment shows in Saudi Arabia – WWE including 30 high profile artists and crew in Riyadh.
- Set up a wide range of successful partnerships with Disney, WWE, Feld Entertainment, Edinburgh Science Festival, Abu Dhabi Tourism Authority, FIFA, Mubadala, Sesame Street, Freej, Abu Dhabi Sports Council, Miral, MBC, Biel and Spectra. 
- Annual responsibility of writing and implementing 5 year strategy & business plan for FLASH including financial forecast, development of new markets, value chain expansion, corporate structure, HR, IT and diversification strategies.
profile_positions.title: Vice President Business Development (Commercial, Sponsorship &  Asset Management Arena Venues)

profile_positions.description: Responsible assessment of management contract, development of business plan, recruitment key staff members, weekly asset and facility management meeting, design reviews, value engineering and board reporting. Etihad Arena is the region’s largest multi-purpose indoor arena set on the stunning waterfront of Yas Bay, offering world-class event space and hospitality. The Etihad Arena is set to become the UAE’s leading entertainment landmark and enhance Abu Dhabi’s position as a global entertainment destination. The venue offers a dynamic event space that can be easily transformed to host a variety of events including large-scale international concerts, sports games, corporate events, private functions and local community celebrations.
profile_positions.title: Project & Asset Manager (FM Operator) - Etihad Arena

profile_positions.description: 2019 AFC Asian Cup and FIFA Club World Cup Local Organizing Committee (LOC). Responsible for strategic planning of the tournaments, budgeting, management structure, sponsorship, community road shows, community outreach and ambassador development. Involved in connecting different government stakeholders (Dubai, Sharjah and Abu Dhabi), FIFA or AFC, rights-holders and national sponsors.
profile_positions.title: Strategy & Head Commercial 2019 AFC Asian Cup; and FIFA Club World Cup 2017 & 2018
Vice President Strategic Planning & New Business
Board Member Mubadala Capitaland Real Estate

profile_positions.description: Part of Senior Management Team responsible for annual planning & strategy, business development, project management of key projects, asset management, business case development, joint venture development, concept development, financial modeling and contract management. Also involved in master planning, feasibility studies and corporate improvement projects worth USD$ 10+ billion in real estate, hospitals, retail, sport, leisure and entertainment developments and assets
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager

profile_positions.description:
Executive Manager at Strategic Consultancy involved in strategic advisory, project management, marketing, master planning, real estate development and financing in the tourism, real estate and hospitality industry in the Middle East. 
•	Provided investment analysis and advisory for the master plan of the “Wave” project valued at $800 million including 3 hotels, golf resort and residential developments in Oman
•	Adviser for one year to Arabtec regarding group structure, strategy, operations efficiency and diversification plans
•	Provided advice for a financial institution on 5 star hotel development, Abu Dhabi hotel market study, hotel operator selection, design advice and consultant management, etc 
•	Undertook feasibility study for a 300 bedroom hotel & resort in Oman
•	Developed location strategy for new financial centre of Abu Dhabi including Stock exchanges and 4 office towers “Sowwah Square”
•	Worked on and advised on hotel management contracts review of 4 and 5 star properties in Oman including Intercontinental and Al Bustan hotel
•	Worked with key team on the development of new hotel classification system for hotels in Oman
•	Provided project management, market and investment strategy for Thales IS into Middle East
profile_positions.title: Executive Manager

profile_positions.description:
Corporate Finance (Amsterdam)
Real Estate, Hospitality and Construction Group

Part of Senior Management team involved in complex project management, sales/marketing/business development, finance, management and team building in the real estate, services and hospitality sector. Worked in Europe and Middle East. Example projects:
•	Instrumental in the preparation of the first Tourism Master Plan for the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Project manager and specialist Advisor for Ernst & Young’s international project management team building up resources/staffing of the Tourism Ministry. Worked closely with HRH Prince Sultan Bin Salman. Prepared and wrote key reports on Tourism Vision and Strategy, Tourism Marketing, Quality Assurance and Tourism Development Plans for the Kingdom
•	Prepared Master plan and feasibility for €80 million real estate development project including an 18 hole “Arnold Palmer” signature golf course, five star 200 bedroom hotel, 100 timeshare units and 100 executive residential plots near Paris, France   
•	Prepared the sale of the 2,000 seats Netherlands Conference Center (NCC) in The Hague to TCN Worldwide Real Estate
•	Assisted in business, branding, portfolio strategy, valuation and raising of equity for two major Dutch hotel groups - Golden Tulip Hotels & Resorts and Bilderberg Hotel group – covering over 40 hotels
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager (Corporate Finance - Amsterdam)

profile_positions.description:
Management Consultants (London)
Real Estate, Hospitality and Construction Group

Involved in project management, brand building, marketing, presentations, finance, market research and business development in the real estate, visitor attraction and hospitality sector. Provided key customer, competitor, company and market insights and reported these insights to key senior decisionmakers. Further assisted in developing appropriate strategies and action plans to address opportunities and issues. Example projects:
•	Managed the successful privatization and sale of former German military airport to a large international real estate/airport operator with a transaction value of €60 million. Managed and coordinated four different departments in the United Kingdom and Germany with regard to tax, accounting, due diligence, finance and legal issues
•	Advised Surrey County Cricket club on €20 million new stadium development at the Oval, London
•	Location and feasibility studies for Scottish & Newcastle on the development of two €50 million family entertainment centers in Brussels and Frankfurt
profile_positions.title: Consultant (Management Consultants - London)

profile_positions.description:
Management Consultants – Tourism and Leisure Developments

Part of small consulting team working on a wide range of projects for private companies, tourist boards, development agencies and government. Assisted management in areas such as master planning, feasibility studies, marketing plans and investment strategies. Example projects:
•	Worked on hotel accommodation strategies for Glasgow, Ayrshire, Highlands and Islands – Scotland
•	Worked on master planning and tourism development strategies for three regions in the Highlands of Scotland. 
•	Undertook innovative marketing repositioning strategy for five star Gleneagles Hotel & Resort in Scotland.
•	Involved in the the master planning of €30 million real estate and visitor attraction development project at the shores of Loch Lomond, Scotland.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Specialized agency of the United Nations
Department of Economics and Statistics

Provided insights arising from multiple sources including competitive intelligence, industry monitoring (publications, news, etc), research and other sources. Assisted in developing recommendations to address issues and opportunities globally. Contributed in the development of monthly, quarterly and annual reports of the WTO. Examples tasks:
•	, Involved in the analysis and advice to developing and developed countries regarding tourism development. Acted as a source for information to multinational companies within the global tourism & hospitality industry.
•	Involved in the preparation and production of the main WTO publications such as Regional Market Trend Reports, The Compendium, and Yearbook of World Tourism.
profile_positions.title: Trainee Analyst

volunteer_experiences.description:
My role has been Adviser to the Founder and I have been responsible for writing business plans, concept and business development proposals related to the development and operation of BAKE. Examples of work:  
- Prepared annual business plans and budgeting for the company.
- Wrote and prepared monthly management reports (2009-2011)
- Assisted in the operation of the company including financial administration, beach and retail operations
- Wrote company policies and procedures including Human Resources, Operations and Health & Safety and Delegation of Authority (DOA)
- Worked on a wide range of proposals and concepts including Beach Club concepts, beach market development, Reem Island Beach Club, Yas Island Beach Club, and proposals to operate Abu Dhabi Corniche Beach, Al Bateen Public Beach and Saadiyat Public Beach

BAKE operates approximately 3 kilometers of beachfront in the Emirate. The services include sun lounge rentals, food & beverage, water sport and beach retail shops with a wide range of beach essentials, beach toys, clothing, water sports equipment, inflatables, souvenirs.
